"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a2456a636872706e692100#post_54a2456a636872706e692100
[bq="SeraphimDawn"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a2444363687231fceb1d00#post_54a2444363687231fceb1d00
Yeah, I've read something about this from an issue of Natgeo.
"America's Changing Face"

Out of curiousity. What ethnicity or ethnicities are you? If you care to share.

I'm Taiwanese Han, perhaps with some Manchu from my dad's side, and minisule amount of aboriginal Taiwanese from my mom.[/bq]
I'm half caucasian; half hispanic and some african descent sprinkle somewhere in there.

topics.body:
My 2014 was just... wow...

I was so focused with my studies for the high school final exams that I didn't take a vacation.
I mean, I could've gone to Paris and Japan that year but my studies were just far too important and I just neglected everything around me to succeed.

I feel like I wasted a year.
